Articles.Content:
Hi all-

My real life demands that I leave the forums for a while. I'll be doing some hiking, and going to a model government program run by the American Legion.

I will probably not be able to return for at least a few weeks. If you need me, send me a PM, so it'll show up in my email inbox.

Great talking to you.

> 
> I shall return!
Good bye. I'll be on standby.

> 
> ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
> Hope you come back soon!

Annnnnnd.... I'm back!
